price: O messengers[21], eat from the lawful things[22] and act righteously, for I am All-Knowing of what you do.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُواْ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: [21] In this verse, all of the messengers have been addressed together, which indicates that they all belonged to the same community and their message was one. [22] They must be wholesome and earned in lawful ways.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-rusulu kulū mina al-ṭayibāti wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna ʿalīmun
